item.title: Michael Jackson - Thriller
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm, raised a half step from the original.
As performed by Michael Jackson.
Perhaps the last Halloween Play Along for 2018?
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Bring Me Sunshine Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
From the Jive Aces..."Bring Me Sunshine." The song uses a lot of chords, starting in Bb (Bb, Cm, F7, Bb7, C7, Eb) and then modulating with a change of tempo to C (C, Dm, G7, C7, D7, F). If working with beginners, try starting at the faster tempo where it changes to C.
This appears for educational use...please support the Jive Aces (who use ukulele) by downloading their albums and songs.
The audio comes from the official Jive Aces video (only the music used):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXvJ8UquYoo
I created the printed lyrics on Keynote, edited in iMovie. Transparency of the sun icon was created in Preview. The chords that are used are a part of the Chordette for Education fonts from ukefarm.com.
